message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, my original offer reflects the true value of this product.  I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $825,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $750,000. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm aiming for a price closer to my initial offer.  Would you consider $800,000? This is my final offer.
I understand that you're sticking to your initial offer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $775,000. That's the highest I can go. Can you reconsider?
